text: 4:5 Ua Me Ini 19:16; Esekiel 1:13; Sekaraia 4:2; Akar Mogomem 1:4; 8:5; 11:19; 16:18Ezɨ kɨ garima, onɨmariba atrivir dabirabimɨn otivaghira tintinibar sɨgha taghtasi. Ezɨ kɨ orazi nɨgɨnir ekiam otozɨ overiam tɨngaghe. Ezɨ atrivir dabirabimɨn guamɨn 7plan adeniba isia iti. Adenir 7plan kaba da 7plan Godɨn duaba.
